## The suits

Suits is an American television drama series created by *Aaron Korsh*, which premiered on June 23, 2011, on the USA Network. It revolves around *Mike Ross*, who begins working as a law associate for *Harvey Specter,* despite never attending law school. The show focuses on *Harvey* and *Mike* managing to close cases, while maintaining *Mike's* secret.
